name: Odyssey (Thepugmen)
description:
You're a square going through the word!

How to play:

Use WASD or ARROW keys to move, if you are on mobile you can tap and drag. Try not to touch the red spikes and also try not to fall into the water/void. there is a checkpoint at the middle of the level. collecting all the gems is optional, but you can as an extra challenge.
